p:
MDCK cells were pretreated for 1 h with 1 or 10 μM H84T or 20 or 40 μM of the fusion inhibitor arbidol (ARB, Cayman Chemical), incubated with octadecyl rhodamine (R18, Sigma-Aldrich)-labeled A/WSN/1933 virus for 1 h at 4 °C to allow attachment of the virus, then washed three times in virus growth buffer and once in PBS to remove unbound virus. Fluorescence dequenching was assessed as previously described ( 37) and as described in
SI Appendix .
